citations.narrative:
At the time of this inspection it was noted that a ring-tailed lemur and two-toed sloth were being exhibited to the general
public along with a variety of other domestic farm animals. These species are not exempt, or excluded, from the definition
of an Animal Welfare exhibitor. Therefore, a USDA Class "C" exhibitor license is needed. An application will need to be
submitted to the USDA - Animal Care office.
No regulated activities can be conducted until a USDA license is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Requirements and application. 
At the time of this inspection it was noted that a ring-tailed lemur and two-toed sloth were being exhibited to the general 
public along with a variety of other domestic farm animals. These species are not exempt, or excluded, from the definition 
of an Animal Welfare exhibitor. Therefore, a USDA Class "C" exhibitor license is needed. An application will need to be 
submitted to the USDA - Animal Care office. 
 
No regulated activities can be conducted until a USDA license is obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
